title: My Friend FRED: The St. Louis Fedâ€™s Free Tool for Economic Data
description: FRED is a free economic database provided by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis that offers over 200,000 frequently updated data series to help journalists add context to their stories about the economy. It allows users to import data directly into graphs and Excel spreadsheets.
keywords: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis
